entity.name: Arpit Bhayani
entity.description: I am a software engineer passionate about databases, distributed systems, and system architecture. I spark engineering curiosity through my social media posts and YouTube videos.

projects.name: DiceDB
projects.description: DiceDB is a redis-compliant, reactive, scalable, highly available, unified cache optimized for modern hardware.

plans.name: Load and performance testing
plans.description: This will cover the monthly server hosting costs to run load tests and performance tests.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of 10 developers working part-time on the projects.

plans.name: Hosting Playground
plans.description: This will cover the monthly server hosting costs to run DiceDB and host Playground making it easier for people to try out DiceDB.

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.

history.description: It has been a community effort up until now.
